meanings.definition: A drug used to treat motion sickness.
meanings.sent1: I took cyclizines before the boat ride to prevent feeling sick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed cyclizines to help with my seasickness.
meanings.sent3: After taking cyclizines, I felt like a superhero with no fear of getting queasy.
meanings.sent4: The cyclizines were like a shield protecting me from the waves of nausea.
meanings.sent5: The cyclizines worked like magic, keeping my stomach calm throughout the journey.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of cyclizines, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more cyclizines for our upcoming trip.
meanings.sent3: The cyclizines on the shelf looked like a colorful army ready to fight against sickness.
meanings.sent4: In the medicine cabinet, the cyclizines stood out like a group of brave soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The cyclizines in the bottle reminded me of tiny defenders against motion sickness.
